user.title: Connect to your Rachio device
user.description: You will need the API Key from https://app.rach.io/. Go to Settings, then click 'GET API KEY'.

data.manual_run_mins: Duration in minutes to run when activating a zone switch

set_zone_moisture_percent.name: Set zone moisture percent
set_zone_moisture_percent.description: Sets the moisture percentage of a zone or list of zones.

percent.name: Percent
percent.description: Set the desired zone moisture percentage.

start_multiple_zone_schedule.name: Start multiple zones
start_multiple_zone_schedule.description: Creates a custom schedule of zones and runtimes. Note that all zones should be on the same controller to avoid issues.

duration.name: Duration
duration.description: Number of minutes to run the zone(s). If only 1 duration is given, that time will be used for all zones. If given a list of durations, the durations will apply to the respective zones listed above.

start_watering.name: Start watering
start_watering.description: Start a single zone, a schedule or any number of smart hose timers.

duration.name: Duration
duration.description: Number of minutes to run. For sprinkler zones the maximum duration is 3 hours, or 24 hours for smart hose timers. Leave empty for schedules.

pause_watering.name: Pause watering
pause_watering.description: Pause any currently running zones or schedules.

devices.name: Devices
devices.description: Name of controllers to pause. Defaults to all controllers on the account if not provided.

duration.name: Duration
duration.description: The time to pause running schedules.

resume_watering.name: Resume watering
resume_watering.description: Resume any paused zone runs or schedules.

devices.name: [%key:component::rachio::services::pause_watering::fields::devices::name%]
devices.description: Name of controllers to resume. Defaults to all controllers on the account if not provided.

stop_watering.name: Stop watering
stop_watering.description: Stop any currently running zones or schedules.

devices.name: [%key:component::rachio::services::pause_watering::fields::devices::name%]
devices.description: Name of controllers to stop. Defaults to all controllers on the account if not provided.
